titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Calvin Ford
CWG13702

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 22.
The United StatesThe State of Kentucky,
To Calvin Ford Dr

row.cell: To Hawling 4 horse team 2 days at $3,00
(hawling Military Stores & Subsistance) at Eminence Camp

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
approved Richard T. Jacob Col. 9th Ky Co
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were a necessary for the Public Service.

Chas A. Clarke Lt & R, q m
9th Ky Cavalry
Received at Frankfort Ky the 18" of Dec 18623, of S, G, Suddarth Q, M, Genl Quartermaster U.S. ArmyState of Ky, the sum of sixteen Dollars and cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 62 Abstract B U Qr. 1862.
Calvin Ford
Dollars 16 -- /100
Paid Decr 18 18623.
